titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd at Biddeford in the county of Devon, on the fifth of Novermber, 1688. By James Wood, Minister of the Gospel there.
titleStmt.author: Wood, James, minister of the Gospel.

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 1 reads: A caveat against false teachers, from Matth. VII. 20. Wherefore by their fruits ye shall know them.
Running title reads: A caveat against false teachers.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
